subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Patrick Zimmer threw five shutout innings and Ben Askelson hit a two-out, two-run single for Billings, Mont., in a 3-1 win over Lafayette, La.
snippet: Patrick Zimmer threw five shutout innings and Ben Askelson hit a two-out, two-run single for Billings, Mont., in a 3-1 win over Lafayette, La.
